title: MG Cloud EV: Everything we know so far about this upcoming Crossover Utility Vehicle
description: MG Motor India announced a new electric Crossover Utility Vehicle, likely the Cloud EV, priced under Rs 20 lakh. It features a 50.3 kWh battery and advanced design elements including LED lights and a sunroof. This model targets young buyers and aims to compete with similar offerings from Tata and Mahindra.
